com.motorola.graphics.j3d
Class Vector3D

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.motorola.graphics.j3d.Vector3D
public class Vector3D
extends java.lang.Object

3D vector class. Values for X, Y and Z are valid within the range from -32768 to 32767.
